com.unvired.ump.agent

Interface IBusinessProcess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BusinessProcess, BusinessProcess

    public interface IBusinessProcess
    The Interface IBusinessProcess.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IBusinessProcess.RequestType
      Enumeration describing the type of the request
      static class  IBusinessProcess.ServerType
      Enumeration to describe the role of the Unvired server in the system landscape

    • Method Detail

      • getServerType

        IBusinessProcess.ServerType getServerType()
        Retrieves the server type
        Returns:
        An enum of IBusinessProcess.ServerType

      • getCustomInput

        java.lang.String getCustomInput()
        Retrieves the raw input to the process agent without any formatting or pre-processing.
        Returns:
        Input to the process agent

      • getBusinessEntityInput

        java.util.List<BusinessEntity> getBusinessEntityInput()
        Retrieves the input to the process agent as a list of BusinessEntity objects. This list of Business Entities is constructed from the raw input submitted by the client to the Unvired server
        Returns:
        Input to the process agent as a list of BusinessEntity objects

      • setOutput

        void setOutput(java.util.List<BusinessEntity> beList,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> beMetaList)
        throws InvalidOutput
        Sets the output from the process agent as a list of BusinessEntity objects.
        Parameters:
        beList - - A list of BusinessEntity objects
        beMetaList - - A list of Business Entity names that should be added to the MetaData tag in the response to the client
        Throws:
        InvalidOutput - An exception describing the reason for rejecting the process agents response

      • setOutput

        void setOutput(java.util.List<BusinessEntity> beList,
               java.util.List<java.lang.String> beMetaList,
               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> properties)
        throws InvalidOutput
        Sets the output from the process agent as a list of BusinessEntity objects.
        Parameters:
        beList - - A list of BusinessEntity objects
        beMetaList - - A list of Business Entity names that should be added to the MetaData tag in the response to the client
        properties - - A list of key value pairs to describe the context of the message processed
        Throws:
        InvalidOutput - An exception describing the reason for rejecting the process agents response

      • setCustomOutput

        void setCustomOutput(java.lang.String response)
              throws InvalidOutput
        Sets the output from the process agent to the client in a custom format.
        Parameters:
        response - - Response from the process agent
        Throws:
        InvalidOutput - An exception describing the reason for rejecting the process agents response

      • createRequest

        IUMPRequest createRequest(IBusinessProcess.RequestType requestType)
        Creates a request object for the specified IBusinessProcess.RequestType. The process agent should subsequently cast it to the specific type to set the input correctly.
        Parameters:
        requestType - - Request type
        Returns:
        Handle to the generic IUMPRequest object

      • createResponse

        IUMPResponse createResponse(IBusinessProcess.RequestType type)
        Creates a response object for the specified IBusinessProcess.RequestType. The process agent should subsequently cast it to the specific type to set the input correctly.
        Parameters:
        requestType - - Request type
        Returns:
        Handle to the generic IUMPResponse object

      • getUniqueClientReferenceID

        java.lang.String getUniqueClientReferenceID()
        Returns an ID posted by the client to identify a request uniquely. This ID, when provided by clients, is used in process agents to determine duplicate requests which may result due to network issues.
        Returns:
        Message ID from the client

      • isMessageReposted

        boolean isMessageReposted()
        Returns a flag indicating if the message is being posted to the process agent for the first time or whether to reconcile from an inconsistent server state.

        Reconciliation occurs when the server terminates unexpectedly before it can process the response from a process agent. Since the result from the process agent in indeterminate after a server restart, the request is resubmitted to the process agent with the flag set to true.

        Process agents can evaluate this flag to determine if the request needs to be reprocessed or ignored.
        Returns:
        true, if is repost

      • getClientMetaXMLVersion

        java.lang.String getClientMetaXMLVersion()
        Returns the version of the application meta model from the MetaModel.xml file used on the client.
        Returns:
        Client meta xml version

      • getServerMetaXMLVersion

        java.lang.String getServerMetaXMLVersion()
        Returns the version of the application meta model from the MetaModel.xml file used on the server.
        Returns:
        Server meta xml version

      • getApplicationContext

        IApplication getApplicationContext()
        Returns the application context of the application being used.
